mapper.select: select memberID, actNum, actPeriod, actSector, actContent from ExternalActivity where memberID = #{memberID} order by actNum ASC
mapper.insert: insert into ExternalActivity (actNum, actPeriod, actSector, actContent, memberID) values ((select nvl(max(actNum),0)+1 from ExternalActivity), #{actPeriod}, #{actSector}, #{actContent}, #{memberID})
